Here it is Pro Tools, one of the best DAW software you can use to make melodies, compositions, custom songs and much more! In this short tutorial of 13 minutes we will see all the main important features you need to know to start using it, even if you are a total beginner. See how to compose, how to work with MIDI and also how to record with your microphone.
